name: The Oldbreak
description:
THE OLDBREAK STORY

You want to go to the bingo badly, but this stupid quarantine won't let you! You then decide to unseathe your crane, brush your three last strands of hair, fix your hip and embark on an adventure to put an end to this once and for all! Be fast though, you might die if you stay outside for too long!

FEATURES 
  • Memes!
  • India's police force!
  • Multiple countries!
  • Toilet paper!
  • Winnie the Flu!
GAMEPLAY MECHANICS 
  • Kill stuff, go faster!
  • Get hit, go slower!
  • Reach the end of the map before the time runs out, otherwise corona will get you!
  • Jump, duck, fast-fall and attack things as you rush through the maps!
  • Complete all challenges to unlock a unique boss fight in the final country and put an end to the outbreak once and for ALL! 
EXPLORE MULTIPLE COUNTRIES
  • USA 
  • Brazil
  • India
  • Australia
  • North Korea
  • Secret country

Jokes aside, this is a humble attempt to bring you all some joy during these dark times. By no means I want to be insensible towards this outbreak, I just wanted to warm you up with some lighthearted humour while you play this game on your mobile sitting on your toilet. Stay safe, mates. This will pass. Love and respect to all affected by this crisis, be it health or economic-wise. Have fun!
